entry.title: How does the Fedora Infra­struc­ture use Python
entry.summary:
Description

The Fedora Project relies on Python for its Infrastructure, almost all applications helping Fedora to be a successful Open Source Project are developed using Python.

This talk will present the applications developed and maintained in Fedora and how they are deployed. The following topics will be developed:

Which applications for which problem Which technologies (Web Framework, Message Bus, etc) Python 2 vs Python 3 and migration Plan Deployment (Ansible, Openshift) Maintenance You will also get all the information needed to start contributing to these applications and to join the Fedora Infrastructure team.
